alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 2:40PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central St. Helena Parish, west central Pike and southeastern Amite Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 237 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Gillsburg, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This includes Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 11 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
